content:
本件保存
會員委設建庫水 門 石 SHIHMEN DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
SDC - 5044
April 28, 1962
Mr. K. T. Li, Secretary-General Council for United States Aid 118 Hwaining Street Taipei, Taiwan
Subject :
USA Surplus Materials
Dear Mr. Li:
Please refer to the attached copy of Mr. G. C. Johnson's letter MK-1474 dated April 27, 1962 and the list attached thereto concerning the above subject.
It is recommended by MKA that the materials as shown in the attached list are required by the Shihmen Project. We, therefore, request your immediate arrangement with AID/M to locate these materials for Shihmen Project.
Your earliest action to the above will be highly appreciated.
y
Very truly yours, SHIHMEN DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
W.IV. IL W. K. Ku Chief Engineer
Enclosures cc: Mr. J. B. Carter, AID/M (w/Encl.) Mr. G. C. Johnson, MKA
國史饭 Academia Historica
